channel.title: Help me with my server Please
channel.description:
Ok, I have downloaded the Dragonscape source. I opened the file and I clicked "runserver" the running bot thing comes up for 1 seconds then dissapears. Does anyone know how to help me? It would be much appritiated. Thanks
~Gonaria :) [br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 03:29:23 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know what the problem may be? XD[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 03:32:34 PM[/size][hr]Lol, any advice on how to fix this problem? Maybe I forgot to download something maybe?
Advice would help. :P

doesn’t it have a compile.bat? i always use that lol i never use runserver
